author: ben
msg: Support for echo protocol, to show how multiprotocol support works.

author: ben
msg: Actually, we should always close the connection when it is finished.

author: stoddard
msg: Complete apache -k restart work. Now, restarts are honored immediately without
loosing connections in the listen queue.

author: ben
msg: And with one bound, he was free! This seemingly minor change allows modules
to take over connection processing, thus making Apache multiprotocol. Woo!

author: stoddard
msg: Update windows documentation to address questions on the newsgroups and PR database.
